mapper.insert: insert into admin_log (log_id, description, username, start_time, spend_time, base_path, uri, url, `method`, user_agent, ip, permissions, `parameter`, `result`) values (#{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{spendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{basePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permissions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parameter,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update admin_log set description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, spend_time = #{spendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, base_path = #{basePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uri = #{uri,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `method` = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_agent = #{userAgent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permissions = #{permissions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `parameter` = #{parameter,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, `result` = #{result,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select log_id, description, username, start_time, spend_time, base_path, uri, url, `method`, user_agent, ip, permissions, `parameter`, `result` from admin_log where log_id = #{logId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
